If we get an uneven number of gems from the boss we can abstain from them I guess, keep it fair that way. I mean, that thing was after US, and WE took it down.

I wonder if we should deface any more things in order to get another of these cashcows to pop up. Worth keeping in mind if we ever decide to do a rerun of this boss fight - the more we piss off the revenants, the better odds there are of getting fat gems.
